message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $170 is my initial asking price, I could come down to $140. I'm confident this product is worth the value it will bring you.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110. Can we meet in the middle?
